debate in the literature on whether such a small mab mass was primordial . we assumed different values of total mass for our primordial mab (see section 2 for a detailed description of model parameters), and that all of our primordial asteroids would be of inner solar system s-complex taxonomic type (demeo & carry 2014, see also discussion in section 1).
